Keywords: Injustice League , Legion of Doom , Scientist , Secret Six
Real Name: Dr. Doris Zuel
Special Powers
RELUCTANT ALLIANCE: When establishing themed teams, you may choose a friendly character named Wonder Woman. If you do, Giganta gains that character's keywords.
GIANT RETALIATION: WHEN TITANS AWAKE!: POWER: Choose an opposing character that attacked a friendly character or that was attacked by a friendly character named Wonder Woman since your last turn. Place Giganta such that she can make a close attack targeting the chosen character, then do so.
KNOCK THEM OFF THEIR FEET: Quake. When Giganta uses it targeting 2+ characters she deals her printed damage value to each hit character and after resolutions give each hit character an action token.
PICK ON SOMEONE YOUR OWN SIZE!: Invulnerability. // Giganta takes a maximum of 1 damage from characters with [Tiny symbol], [Standard symbol], or [Colossal symbol].

Comments
November 2, 2021
tyroclix
WIN/LOSS: 5-4 25 point Giganta packs a mean punch for the points. Wildcard + WW TA for friendly wildcards, "Colossal Retaliation" and super-quake - plus she usually requires 2 hits to take down - you'll be hard pressed to find a better use for 25 points. Giant-Sized Willpower makes it likely to be able to act every turn - just a great piece of a character I really am a fan of. While highly susceptible to Outwit, if you can get her stealth (say via wildcard), she will be an amazing asset.
July 29, 2021
Gerry
Quake is passive, so, the stuff is: Power activates retaliation --> Places giganta --> Attack that can be quake (and 2 squares reach because giant size)--> Damage with printed damage to each target-->action token to each hit character. Retaliation can also be activated at 75 pts.
July 29, 2021
fastcat99
With her colossal retaliation, is quake passive now? Can she use it, or does the 'close attack' mean just a plain ol' boring attack?
